subject: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Beneficiary
APPROVED  $10,500,000.00
Note that we pay via  wire transfer, atm master card , online
account, bank draft
In our office sometime last month, One Mr. John T. Kehoe of 1200 Fitch
Way, Sacramento, CA. 95864 filed an application contrary to your
Pending fund transfer. The above mentioned person visited this Bank
yesterday with a power of attorney given in his favor by your good
self, granting him the benefit to process and claim your compensation fund
of $10,500,000.00(Twenty Million  Five Hundred  Thousand United States
Dollars Only) as approved office of the presidency
He further Stated that the online account be terminated while the fund
should be wired to his Bank account with Bank of America, Routing
Number 121000358. We have asked Mr. John T. Kehoe to come back to the
Bank within 48 hours to enable us have a personal confirmation from
you, being hitherto the beneficiary.
Our office needs to know:
1. Did you instruct one Mr. John T. Kehoe of 1200 Fitch way,
Sacramento, CA. 95864, to claim and receive the payment on your
behalf?
2. Did you sign any 'Deed of Assignment' in his favor thereby making
him the current beneficiary?
Your confirmation to the above will be appreciated. We look forward to
hearing from you soon  and if you did not send Mr. John T. Kehoe
kindly reconfirm to me the  following information for immediate
transfer of your fund
Confirm this mail and get  back to  me  with the follow information
{1} BANK DETAILS
{2} FULL NAME
{3} ADDRESS
{4}OCCUPATION
5}.PHONE NUMBER
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
AS SOON AS I CONFIRM YOUR INFORMATION YOUR FUND WILL BE TRANSFER WITH OUT
Best Regards
DR MARY IGWE
FOREIGN PAYMENT DIRECTOR CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Mary Igwe,

Thank you for your email. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall giving any power of attorney to Mr. John T. Kehoe or anyone else for that matter. It's strange how he could claim such a thing.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did Mr. Kehoe present himself and what kind of documents did he provide to support his claims?

Also, I'm curious about the fund you mentioned - Twenty Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars Only. That's quite a sum! Could you tell me more about where it came from and why it was approved in my name?

I'm sorry but I can't provide the information you asked for at the moment as I need to understand the situation better first.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: URGENT ATTENTION
body:
Hello Dr. Mary Igwe,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about being shortlisted! I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear from the office of the president. 

I'm curious, how did my name end up on this list? And what is this payment for exactly? Also, could you please provide more information about Mr. John T. Kehoe? I don't recall giving any power of attorney to him or anyone else.

As for the details you asked for, I'm afraid I can't share them over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can proceed with this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria
